about:
I am currently a student completing my Diploma in Information Technology (Software Development). I hold with me a Higher Certificate in Information Technology that I acquired at Pearson Institute of Higher Education now known as Eduvos. 

 Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to perform well in a team. Seeking to help your company Develop their products and applications as a software engineer, as well as grow and develop my own skills as a coder. 

 I excel in the Software Engineering aspect, However i am open to any opportunities that come my way in the field of IT and i am willing to learn. 
  I would like to work at SovTech because I have a passion for developing webistes and applications to solve problems big or small, this kept me motivated thorughout my education as I will always find a way to solve a problem
